skill.name: World Ender
skill.description: Transform for 10 seconds, gaining 15% of AP Omnivamp. While transformed, attacks deal 80% of AS bonus + % of AD physical damage.

skill.name: Essence Theft
skill.description:
Steal essence from enemies around the current target, dealing magic damage and Mana Reaving them. 

Every number of casts, unleash a wave that deals magic damage to all enemies hit. This deals 33% more damage to enemies whose essence has been stolen.

Ionia Bonus: +3 Mana per second

Mana Reave: Increase max Mana by 35% until the next cast

skill.name: Comeuppance
skill.description: Lock on to the farthest enemy and unleash a hail of 6 shots toward them. Each deals 125% of AD + % of AP physical damage to the first enemy hit.

skill.name: Moonlight Vigil
skill.description: Fire a moon blast at the largest group of enemies that deals physical damage to enemies within 2 hexes.\n\nFor 7 seconds, equip 3 Chakram, plus 1 more for each enemy hit by the blast (Max 10). Attacks deal bonus physical damage for each Chakram equipped. Aphelios heals for 50% of AP of damage dealt by Chakrams.

skill.name: Volley
skill.description: Fire 8 arrows in a cone, each dealing 110% of AD as physical damage to the first enemy hit and Chilling them for 2% of AP seconds.\n\nChill: Reduced Attack Speed by 30%
skill.description_kr: Fire 8 arrows in a cone, each dealing 110% of AD as physical damage to the first enemy hit and Chilling them for 2% of AP seconds.\n\nChill: Reduced Attack Speed by 30%

skill.name: Arise!
skill.description: Passive: Every third attack, a Sand Soldier deals magic damage to their target.\n\nActive: Summon a Sand Soldier to attack your target. If Azir already has 3 Soldiers, they all immediately deal 70% of the damage instead.
skill.description_kr: Passive: Every third attack, a Sand Soldier deals magic damage to their target.\n\nActive: Summon a Sand Soldier to attack your target. If Azir already has 3 Soldiers, they all immediately deal 70% of the damage instead.

skill.name: Royal Maelstrom
skill.description: Lash out at the lowest Health enemy in range 6 + 6 per 100% of AS bonus times. Each lash deals 75% of AD + % of AP physical damage and 2% of the target's max Health as true damage.

skill.name: Twin Fang
skill.description: Deal magic damage to the current target and Wound them for 5 seconds. If they are already Wounded, deal 30% bonus magic damage.\n\nWound: Reduce healing received by 50%

skill.name: Feast
skill.description: Deal magic damage + 10% of HP to the lowest Health enemy in range. If this kills them, devour them and permanently gain maximum Health.

skill.name: Noxian Guillotine
skill.description: Deal 350% of AD + % of AP physical damage to the current target. If they die, immediately cast this again with less damage.

skill.name: Phase Dive
skill.description: Heal 30% of damage taken in the last 4 seconds and deal magic damage to the current target.

skill.name: Shield of Durand
skill.description: Reduce damage taken by 20% and heal for % of AP over 4 seconds. After, deal magic damage to adjacent enemies.

skill.name: Judgement
skill.description: Spin 2 + 1 per 50% of AS bonus times every second for the next 4% of AP seconds. Each spin deals physical damage to adjacent enemies.

skill.name: Snip Snip!
skill.description: Dash around the current target and snip 3 times in a cone, each dealing magic damage to enemies hit.\n\nEvery 3 casts, gain Armor and Magic resist.

skill.name: CH-3X Lightning Grenade
skill.description: Hurl a grenade towards the largest group of enemies, dealing magic damage to enemies in a large area and Stunning them.\n\n4 Star Upgrade: YES YES YES, IT WORKS!

skill.name: Defiant Dance
skill.description: Enter a defensive stance and gain Shield that rapidly decays over 3 seconds. When it expires, deal magic damage + 30% of the damage absorbed to enemies around and in front of Irelia.\n\nIonia Bonus: +40 Armor and Magic Resist

skill.name: Cataclysm
skill.description: Leap on a nearby enemy. Deal magic damage to enemies within 2 hexes and Stun them.

skill.name: Acceleration Blast
skill.description: Grant 20% of AP Attack Speed to Jayce and adjacent allies on his left and right for 3 seconds. Fire a blast at the current target that explodes on the first enemy hit. It deals physical damage to enemies near the blast.

skill.name: Curtain Call
skill.description: Take aim at the current target and deal 744% of AD + 60% of AP physical damage to enemies in a line; each hit reduces damage by 40%.\n\nIonia Bonus: +30% Attack Damage
skill.description_kr: Take aim at the current target and deal 744% of AD + 60% of AP physical damage to enemies in a line; each hit reduces damage by 40%.\n\nIonia Bonus: +30% Attack Damage

skill.name: Fishbones!
skill.description: Fire 5 rockets at random enemies within 2 hexes of the current target. Each rocket deals % of AD + % of AP physical damage.

skill.name: Icathian Rain
skill.description: Dash away from all enemies, then fire missiles split across the 4 nearest enemies. Each missile deals magic damage.

skill.name: Pierce and Rend
skill.description: Passive: Attacks impale a spear in the target, which deals true damage when removed. Kalista rips the spears out if it would kill the target.\n\nActive: Impale 6 spears in the current target.

skill.name: Inner Flame
skill.description: Fire a burst of energy at Karma's target that explodes upon impact, dealing magic damage to adjacent enemies. Every third cast launches 3 bursts.\n\nIonia Bonus: +30% Ability Power

skill.name: Force Pulse
skill.description: Gain % of AP Shield for 4 seconds. Deal magic damage to enemies in a cone and Disarm them.\n\nDisarm: Cannot move or attack, but CAN cast spells

skill.name: Voracity
skill.description: Throw three daggers that land next to enemies within 1+ Attack Range hexes. Then, teleport to each to deal magic damage to adjacent enemies and Wound them for 6 seconds.\n\nWound: Reduce healing received by 50%

skill.name: Divine Ascent
skill.description:
Passive: Gains new Passive effects as your Tactician levels up.
Level 1: Attacks deal bonus magic damage.
Level 6: Every 3rd attack launches a wave that deals magic damage and 40% Shreds enemies for 3 seconds.
Level 9: Every attack launches a wave and they travel farther.

Shredded: Reduced Magic Resist by 50%

skill.name: Skaaaaaaarl!
skill.description:
Passive: Start combat with 40% of HP Shield. When it breaks, dismount and gain % of AP stacking Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

Active: Remount and gain 40% of HP Shield.

4 Star Upgrade: Execute enemies under 25% Health.

skill.name: All Out Strike
skill.description: Knock up the current target before smashing them to the edge of the battlefield. Deal magic damage and Stun them. Deal 50% of the damage to enemies the target collides with and Stun them for 50% of the duration.\n\nIf the target can't be pushed back any further, knock them off the battlefield. Otherwise, KSante will chase after them.

skill.name: Frozen Tomb
skill.description: Stun the current target for 2 seconds and deal magic damage to enemies within 2 hexes of them. They take 10% more damage for the next 4 seconds.

skill.name: Torrent of Light
skill.description: Channel a barrage of light at the current target that deals magic damage over time, reducing their Magic Resistance every second. If they die, shift to a new target.

skill.name: Call of the Void
skill.description: Open two portals near the current target. Destroy 35% of shields and deal magic damage to all enemies caught between the portals.

skill.name: Sap Magic
skill.description: Passive: Whenever an enemy uses their ability, gain 5 Mana.\n\nActive: On next attack, heal.

skill.name: Soul Eater
skill.description: Steal max Health, 10% Attack Damage, and Armor and Magic Resist from the nearest enemies for 8% of AP seconds.\n\nWhile empowered, every third attack deals physical damage.

skill.name: Command: Protect
skill.description: Grant the lowest Health ally Shield for 4 seconds. When the Shield expires, it deals magic damage to adjacent enemies and Chills them for 3 seconds.\n\nChill: Reduced Attack Speed by 30%

skill.name: Steadfast Hammer
skill.description: Gain Shield for 3 seconds. Deal magic damage to the current target.\n\n4 Star Upgrade: Knock the target into the largest clump of enemies, dealing 33% of the target's max Health as magic damage to the target and 15% of that amount to the clump. Stun them for 1 seconds.

skill.name: Furious Bite
skill.description: Deal physical damage to the current target. If they are below 60% Health, this damage is multiplied by 100% + 20% of AP true damage instead.\n\nIf this kills the target, rip through them 1 hex and heal for 15% of HP + 15% of AP.

skill.name: Cull the Meek
skill.description: Deal magic damage to adjacent enemies. Heal for the first enemy hit and another 30% of AP for each additional one.

skill.name: Realm Warp
skill.description: Ryze creates a portal to Demacia underneath a cluster of injured allies, granting a Shield. If an ally leaves the safety of the portal, they are healed.
skill.description_kr: Ryze creates a portal to Demacia underneath a cluster of injured allies, granting a Shield. If an ally leaves the safety of the portal, they are healed.

skill.name: Realm Warp
skill.description: Ryze creates a portal to the Freljord underneath a random group of enemies. The freezing winds deal magic damage to enemies within two hexes over the duration and apply Permafrost, a permanent Attack Speed Slow.
skill.description_kr: Ryze creates a portal to the Freljord underneath a random group of enemies. The freezing winds deal magic damage to enemies within two hexes over the duration and apply Permafrost, a permanent Attack Speed Slow.

skill.name: Realm Warp
skill.description: Ryze creates a portal to Shurima, summoning a gigantic sand tornado that travels across the battlefield, dealing magic damage to enemies hit and knocking them up briefly.
skill.description_kr: Ryze creates a portal to Shurima, summoning a gigantic sand tornado that travels across the battlefield, dealing magic damage to enemies hit and knocking them up briefly.

skill.name: Realm Warp
skill.description:
Create 3 portals to Zaun, causing hired guns to fire at nearby enemies. Deals magic damage and Wound, 40% Shreds, and 40% Sunders for 6 seconds. The more gold you have, the more powerful the portals become.

25 Gold: +1 portal. Portals fire a rocket deals damage in a one-hex radius.
50 Gold: Double the portals. Summon 1 additional portals for every 15 Gold more.
skill.description_kr:
Create 3 portals to Zaun, causing hired guns to fire at nearby enemies. Deals magic damage and Wound, 40% Shreds, and 40% Sunders for 6 seconds. The more gold you have, the more powerful the portals become.

25 Gold: +1 portal. Portals fire a rocket deals damage in a one-hex radius.
50 Gold: Double the portals. Summon 1 additional portals for every 15 Gold more.

skill.name: Realm Warp
skill.description: Ryze summons a portal to Piltover that launches out an enforcer grenade towards his target, dealing magic damage to enemies within two hexes and creating a containment area. Enemies are unable to leave the area, and a of the damage dealt to them is also dealt to all other enemies within.
skill.description_kr: Ryze summons a portal to Piltover that launches out an enforcer grenade towards his target, dealing magic damage to enemies within two hexes and creating a containment area. Enemies are unable to leave the area, and a of the damage dealt to them is also dealt to all other enemies within.

skill.name: Realm Warp
skill.description: Ryze creates a portal to Noxus' armory that spews out a torrent of weapons and armor,  granting completed items to random allies with open slots, and throwing Axes towards random enemies that deal magic damage each.
skill.description_kr: Ryze creates a portal to Noxus' armory that spews out a torrent of weapons and armor,  granting completed items to random allies with open slots, and throwing Axes towards random enemies that deal magic damage each.

skill.name: Realm Warp
skill.description: Ryze creates a portal to Ionia, summoning forth a Spirit Tree that affects the closest units. Allies are invigorated, gaining Attack Speed and restoring Health over the duration. Enemies are pacified, causing them to dance.
skill.description_kr: Ryze creates a portal to Ionia, summoning forth a Spirit Tree that affects the closest units. Allies are invigorated, gaining Attack Speed and restoring Health over the duration. Enemies are pacified, causing them to dance.

skill.name: Realm Warp
skill.description: Ryze creates a portal to the skies above Mount Targon that beckons his target. After a few seconds, they descend from the heavens as a meteor towards the largest cluster of enemies, dealing a percent of the the initial target's maximum Health as magic damage and knocking up enemies in the epicenter.
skill.description_kr: Ryze creates a portal to the skies above Mount Targon that beckons his target. After a few seconds, they descend from the heavens as a meteor towards the largest cluster of enemies, dealing a percent of the the initial target's maximum Health as magic damage and knocking up enemies in the epicenter.

skill.name: Realm Warp
skill.description: Ryze creates a portal to Bandle City underneath a random unit on your bench. After a brief delay, they arrive on the battlefield with bonus mana and are...slightly smaller?
skill.description_kr: Ryze creates a portal to Bandle City underneath a random unit on your bench. After a brief delay, they arrive on the battlefield with bonus mana and are...slightly smaller?

skill.name: Realm Warp
skill.description: Ryze creates a portal to the Shadow Isles, reclaiming lost ally's souls. They return to the battlefield, with a percent of their maximum Health.
skill.description_kr: Ryze creates a portal to the Shadow Isles, reclaiming lost ally's souls. They return to the battlefield, with a percent of their maximum Health.

skill.name: Flair
skill.description: Shoot at the current target and deal 200% of AD to the first enemy hit. Reduce their Armor for the rest of combat.

skill.name: Fury of the North
skill.description:
Passive: Whenever an ally attacks a Chilled enemy, they deal % of HP bonus true damage.

Active: Gain % of AP Shield for 4 seconds. Deal magic damage to nearby enemies and Chill them for 4 seconds.

Chill: Reduced Attack Speed by 30%

skill.name: Dawning Shadow
skill.description: Fire a massive beam at the furthest enemy, dealing physical damage to all enemies hit. Any allies hit gain Shield for 4 seconds.

skill.name: Facebreaker
skill.description:
Grab an enemy from either side and slam them together, knocking them up. Deals magic damage and Stuns them.

If only one enemy is grabbed, the damage and Stun duration are increased by 50%.

Ionia Bonus: +180 Maximum Health

skill.name: Ki Barrier
skill.description: Gain % of AP Shield and grant % of AP Shield to the 2 lowest Health allies for 4 seconds. After shielding his allies, Shen's shield refreshes with a burst, dealing magic damage to adjacent enemies.\n\nIonia Bonus: +10% Damage Reduction

skill.name: Glory in Death
skill.description: Passive: Upon death, reanimate with 100% Health, decaying per second. Sion can no longer use his ability, but is immune to Crowd Control and gains 150% of AP Attack Speed.\n\nActive: Charge towards the most enemies within 3 + Attack Range hexes. Deal physical damage to any enemies along the way and knock them up, Stuning them.

skill.name: Crescendo
skill.description: Send a wave of sound at the largest clump of enemies and deal magic damage to enemies hit. Allies hit by the wave gain Attack Speed for 5 seconds.

skill.name: Astral Infusion
skill.description: Heal the lowest health ally for % of AP. If the ally is below 50% Health, heal them for an additional 50%. \n\nOver the next 5 seconds, 5 stars hit the enemy closest to them. Each deals magic damage.

skill.name: Demonflare
skill.description: Transform and gain % of AP max Health for 6 seconds. While transformed, deal magic damage to enemies within 2 hexes every second.

skill.name: Seismic Shove
skill.description: Passive: Whenever an enemy is knocked up or back by anything, throw a boulder towards them. It deals magic damage to the first enemy hit.\n\nActive: Deal magic damage to your target and knock them up, stunning them for 2 seconds.

skill.name: Radiance
skill.description: Gain % of AP Shield for 6 seconds. It absorbs damage received by adjacent allies.

skill.name: Noxious Trap
skill.description:
Hurl an explosive heat-seeking mushroom at the current target. When it detonates, enemies within 1 hex are Wounded and dealt magic damage over 3 seconds.

4 Star Upgrade: Increase the explosion radius by 1 hex.

Wounded: Reduced healing received by 50%

skill.name: Rapid Fire
skill.description: Gain 70% of AP Attack Speed for 4 seconds. For the duration, attacks explode on impact and deal 60% of AD physical damage to enemies within 1 hex.\n\n4 Star Upgrade: Every 8th attack deals 100% of AD bonus physical damage and ricochets to the largest clump of enemies, dealing 50% of AD physical damage to enemies within 1 hex.
skill.description_kr: Gain 70% of AP Attack Speed for 4 seconds. For the duration, attacks explode on impact and deal 60% of AD physical damage to enemies within 1 hex.\n\n4 Star Upgrade: Every 8th attack deals 100% of AD bonus physical damage and ricochets to the largest clump of enemies, dealing 50% of AD physical damage to enemies within 1 hex.

skill.name: Disdain
skill.description: Passive: Whenever an enemy enters Attack Range, fire a blast from the leg facing that direction that deals 275% of AD + % of AP physical damage. Each of Urgot's 6 legs has a cooldown.\n\nActive: Gain % of AP Shield for 5 seconds and dash behind the current target. Reset all leg cooldowns.

skill.name: Plasma Fission
skill.description: Fire a plasma bolt towards the current target that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit. It then splits in two, dealing 50% less damage whenever it passes through an enemy.

skill.name: Blast Shield
skill.description: Gain % of AP Shield for 4 seconds. Deal 200% of AD physical damage to enemies within 1 hex of the current target and 40% Sunder them for 4 seconds.\n\nSunder: Reduced Armor

skill.name: Blade of the Ruined King
skill.description: Deal magic damage to the current target. For the rest of combat, Viego's attacks deal bonus stacking magic damage.

skill.name: Primal Howl
skill.description: Passive: Attacks heal for % of AP.\n\nActive: Increase the Passive healing by 50% for 2.5 seconds. Then, Stun adjacent enemies.

skill.name: Last Breath
skill.description: Send a whirlwind at the furthest enemy within 2 + Attack Range hexes, knocking up and Stunning all enemies hit. Dash to and slash the original target, dealing % of AD + % of AP physical damage to them. Slam them into the ground and deal physical damage to enemies within 1 hex.\n\nIonia Bonus: +15% Omnivamp

skill.name: Living Shadow
skill.description: Create a shadow at the furthest enemy within 2 + Attack Range hexes. Zed and his shadow slash adjacent enemies, dealing % of AD + % of AP physical damage. \n\nIonia Bonus: +15% Critical Strike Chance and Critical Strike Damage

skill.name: Surge
skill.description: Passive: Execute enemies below 8% + 4% of AP Health.\n\nActive: For the next 5 seconds, attacks chain lightning to additional enemies, dealing physical damage. Kills reset this duration.
